attributes.action: Stop wasting our time with this e-petitions nonsense if all we get is empty meaningless responses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the time wasting non-response to the recent petition about NFPPostcodes http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22222 the government should be honest enough to say it will take absolutely no notice of e-petitions and Sir Humphrey is alive and well. It will take down this site and stop wasting everybody's time.

rejection.details:
Please send any comments you have about petition responses to Number 10 directly. 
http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
